Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People today we have a lot to cover on the latest happenings around the country. Firstly the Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers has highlighted that debt repayments from taxpayers are going to be the second biggest spending pressure in the budget costing $60 million per day. In addition Lion Chief Executive Sam Fisher has urged the Federal Government to pause beer tax increases that could affect rural pubs amongst the rising cost of living. Finally Sky News has reported on ANZ's performance record and how it managed to increase its revenue by expanding its Australian mortgage book by 4.3%.
